text: Forest officials on Thursday arrested a 28-year-old man and seized 19 country made bombs used for hunting. Officials received a tipoff that a few were involved in hunting in Rayakottai forest area. They found a man with nets used for catching birds and animals. He was identified as C. Ramamoorthy of Mettuparai. The officials produced him in the court and he was lodged at Hosur sub-jail.
title: Man arrested
